SELECT T1.RGLTN_VARB_ID AS RGLTN_VARB_NM /* 변수명 */
, T1.SELL_TP_CD /* 판매유형코드 */ , T1.VARB_SN /* 변수일련번호 */ , T1.CHO_FXN_DV_CD /* 선택고정구분코드 */ , T1.RGLTN_VARB_ID /* 규칙변수ID */ , T1.SORT_ODR /* 정렬순서 */ , T1.TEMP_SAVE_YN /* 임시저장여부 */ , T1.DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ , T1.FST_RGST_DTM , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID , RU.USR_NM AS FST_RGST_USR_NM /* 등록자 */ , T1.FNL_MDFC_DTM , T1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , MU.USR_NM AS FNL_MDFC_USR_NM /* 최종수정자 */ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BYTP_VARB_BAS T1 /* 상품유형별변수기본 */ LEFT JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_PRP_META_BAS M1 ON T1.RGLTN_VARB_ID = M1.PD_PRP_META_ID AND M1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M RU ON RU.USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID LEFT JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M MU ON MU.USR_ID = T1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} /* 판매유형 */
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CMZ_MLNG_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND M1.UI_LBL_CDV = MLNG_ID AND UPPER(MLNG_CNTN) LIKE UPPER(#{rgltnVarbNm}) )
